text: Spawns an Araby minor faction in Ind
Additional starting regions for Sultanate of El-Kalabad (IEE)
Gives Akhaba and Sud to the Sultanate of El-Kalabad

If multiple mods are fighting over a single region, the higher the latency, the more likely it is to take over that region. Do note that it also means more likely you'll see the moment of ownership change
Spawns an Araby minor faction in Khuresh
